summary: Testing of Stage 1 prospection and qualification system. All 20 backend API tests pass (endpoints properly protected with auth). Frontend builds successfully. New tabs (Prospección, Import Contacts, To Qualify) added to Today's Focus page.
critical_code_review_comments: All 18 prospection endpoints properly protected with authentication (return 401 without auth)
LinkedIn tab now filters Stage 1 contacts to only show 'qualified' status (line 729 in mensajes_hoy.py)
ContactSheet.jsx includes Stage 1 status selector (lines 1363-1438) - shows only for Stage 1 contacts
New tabs properly exported from todays-focus/index.js barrel file
All new components have data-testid attributes for testing
File sizes are reasonable: prospection.py (832 lines), ToQualifyTabContent.jsx (421 lines), ProspectionTabContent.jsx (487 lines)

test_credentials.note: Google OAuth required - @leaderlix.com domain users only

context_for_next_testing_agent: Stage 1 prospection system implemented. All endpoints require Google OAuth. Backend tests verify endpoints exist and return 401 without auth. Full integration testing requires authenticated session. Key endpoints: /api/prospection/to-qualify/stats, /api/prospection/linkedin-import/status, /api/prospection/active-companies, /api/prospection/queue/{profile}

linkedin_tab_filtering.description: Stage 1 contacts filtered to only show qualification_status='qualified'

contact_sheet_stage1_selector.description: Stage 1 status selector shows for Stage 1 contacts with options: pending_accept, accepted, conversation_open
